prompt: Preserve 100% of the girl's facial features in the attached photo; do not alter any details on her face. Create a natural, cinematic portrait of a young girl with bright, smooth skin, a delicate face lightly made up in a natural peach tone, clear eyes gazing into the distance, and a calm, dreamy expression.Her thick, smooth, dark brown hair, reaching past her waist, is loosely braided into a single large braid, draped to one side of her shoulder, with a few strands gently blowing in the wind, creating a very natural and poetic feel. She holds a book in her arms.She is wearing a simple, short-sleeved white shirt made of soft fabric, buttoned at the front, in a minimalist style. Shoot at least 2/3 of her body, from a low angle focusing on 2/3 of her face, with her head slightly tilted upwards. Keep the camera low and focus on her face. She turns to the right.The setting is an outdoor space, with a wisteria trellis in the background creating a soft bokeh effect. Natural light filters through the foliage, creating diagonal streaks of light in the frame. The lighting is soft, with muted blue-purple-brown tones, subtle contrast, and not overly vibrant.The style is cinematic, evoking nostalgia and tranquility. It features a shallow depth of field, a strongly blurred background, soft lighting, natural colors, a film-like quality, high detail, realism, and is a high-quality cinematic portrait.
